title: About
text:
Welcome to my personal blog! My name is OUN VIKRETH. Here, I share my thoughts, experiences, and projects related to technology, programming, and personal growth.
This blog serves as a space to document my learning journey, showcase my work, and connect with like-minded individuals. Feel free to explore my posts and reach out if you have any questions or feedback.
Thank you for visiting!
សូស្ដី

title: Curriculum Vitae
text:
EDUCATION
Engineer Degree in Data Science  Institute of Technology of Cambodia, Sen Sok, Phnom Penh 2020 — Present
Professional Training in Artificial Intelligence (AI)  TUX Global Institute, Phnom Penh Mar 2022 — Mar 2023

Modules taken: Human Centered Design, Mathematical Foundations of AI, Machine Learning & Database.

title: Curriculum Vitae
text:
WORK EXPERIENCE

Credit Risk Modelling and Research, Officer
ABA Bank, Head Office, Phnom Penh Jun 2025 — Present

Performing validation on PD, LGD, and MEVs scenarios calibration.

Reviewing and challenging quantitative and qualitative methodology.

Developing dashboards of portfolio analysis for Credit Risk Management Division.



Data Scientist, Apprentice
Wing Bank, Wing Tower, Phnom Penh Feb 2025 — May 2025

Developed credit scorecard model for customer creditworthiness (application and behavioural).

Researched new methodologies for tactical projects.



Reporting and Analytics, Intern
Khmer Beverages, Headquarter, Phnom Penh Jun 2024 — Sep 2024

Developed and maintained a Sales Performance Dashboard using Power BI to track key metrics.

Assisted in preparing and delivering reports for internal stakeholders.

Conducted regional market visits to collect outlet feedback data.

Identified and resolved data discrepancies to ensure dashboard accuracy.



Data Analytics Intern
Smart Axiata, Headquarter, Phnom Penh Aug 2023 — Nov 2023

Extracted, transformed, and loaded data into target databases and data warehouses.

Integrated multiple data sources into dashboards for comprehensive performance insights.

Optimized SQL queries to improve performance and reduce execution time.

Reviewed data outputs from the Data Engineering team for accuracy.
